column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " All right , let 's do this !
#Text=Zip it .
#Text=Now .
#Text=I had enough of your babble on the way in .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes , ma'am .
#Text=" Opal says : " Kuvira tore down all the domes .
#Text=Why would she do that ?
#Text=" Lin says : " She 's got a whole battalion of troops stationed there .
#Text=There 's no way we 'll be able to spot anything useful from here .
#Text=We 'll have to go in for a closer look .
#Text=" Toph says : " Do n't bother .
#Text=All the prisoners have been moved .
#Text=" Lin says : " Uh ... hey , Chief .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , Chief .
#Text=" Opal says : " Grandma Toph !
#Text=" Toph says : " You were only up to my waist the last time we were together .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , man !
#Text=Ohh , I ca n't .
#Text=This ca n't be happening !
#Text=" Toph says : " What ?!
#Text=Do you have to pee or something ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No ... well , now , maybe .
#Text=You 're my hero !
#Text=My name is Bolin .
#Text=I 'm dating your granddaughter , I mean , kind of .
#Text=I may have screwed that up , but that 's why I 'm here and you 're my hero !
#Text=Oh , I said that .
#Text=Can I have a hug too ?
#Text=" Toph says : " What 's up with him ?
#Text=" Lin says : " He 's an actor .
#Text=So , you already checked the city for Su ?
#Text=How did you know she was captured ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I 've been living in the swamp and keeping watch on Zaofu through the vines .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sure , okay , makes sense .
#Text=" Toph says : " By the time I got here , they were gone .
#Text=I snooped around town and heard that they were taken away to some nearby prison camp .
#Text=" Opal says : " Where would that be ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " There 's a factory and reeducation facility not too far away .
#Text=" Toph says : " How do you know that ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Bolin used to work for Kuvira .
#Text=" Toph says : " How did you end up dating the kind of dipstick who works for Kuvira ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " " Used to " !
#Text=" Lin says : " It 's not his silver tongue , I can tell you that .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Please tell me this attitude is n't hereditary .
#Text="
